about_the_game:
In Pepper City, SuperEat Dad is the top vigilante and food delivery guy alongside his AI-powered car. His nemesis Grubbr Guy has always tried to get his hands on the car, always failing to until one fateful day where he strikes SuperEat Dad down and steals the car.
His most nefarious plot is soon underway: take over Pepper City and by upgrading his food delivery drone army with the AI capabilities of the car! With SuperEat Dad seemingly killed, his son SuperEat Man exiles himself from the city until he's dragged back into the fray by an emissary from an old ally. When he's told that his father may still be alive and held in Grubbr Guy's latest lair, SuperEat Man hops on his new rocket-BMX and takes up his energy weapons to fight for his redemption and honor!

STUNT 'N GUN GAMEPLAY
Look for obstacles to grind on and pull off mid-air tricks with your high-tech rocket-powered BMX while scrapping evil drones with an upgradable arsenal of 3 deadly energy weapons!

DASTARDLY DRONES
Fight against 7 distinct enemy types and 3 brtual bosses!

GO OUT IN STYLE
The Style Meter system multiplies your currency gains and rewards mastery! Clear levels with a higher and higher stlye rank to show off your skills!
detailed_description:
In Pepper City, SuperEat Dad is the top vigilante and food delivery guy alongside his AI-powered car. His nemesis Grubbr Guy has always tried to get his hands on the car, always failing to until one fateful day where he strikes SuperEat Dad down and steals the car.
His most nefarious plot is soon underway: take over Pepper City and by upgrading his food delivery drone army with the AI capabilities of the car! With SuperEat Dad seemingly killed, his son SuperEat Man exiles himself from the city until he's dragged back into the fray by an emissary from an old ally. When he's told that his father may still be alive and held in Grubbr Guy's latest lair, SuperEat Man hops on his new rocket-BMX and takes up his energy weapons to fight for his redemption and honor!

STUNT 'N GUN GAMEPLAY
Look for obstacles to grind on and pull off mid-air tricks with your high-tech rocket-powered BMX while scrapping evil drones with an upgradable arsenal of 3 deadly energy weapons!

DASTARDLY DRONES
Fight against 7 distinct enemy types and 3 brtual bosses!

GO OUT IN STYLE
The Style Meter system multiplies your currency gains and rewards mastery! Clear levels with a higher and higher stlye rank to show off your skills!

name: SuperEat Man

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit, version 1909 or later
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB / AMD Radeon RX 580 8GB or equivalent DX12-compatible GPU with 4GB VRAM (Ray tracing features disabled)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit, version 1909 or later
  • Processor: 8-core Intel or AMD, 3.2 GHz or faster
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 / AMD Radeon RX 6700 XT or higher (Ray tracing enabled)
  • DirectX: Version 12

short_description: After 6 years of self-exile, food delivery hero SuperEat Man returns to Pepper City to fight for his redemption and honor against him and his father's nemesis in this "stunt 'n gun" third-person shooter.
